briefdescription.para: Sets morphological anti-aliasing to enabled or disabled state on a GPU.

detaileddescription.para: Sets morphological anti-aliasing to enabled or disabled state on a GPU.

entry.para: The new morphological anti-aliasing state. Set true to enable morphological anti-aliasing. Set false to disable morphological anti-aliasing.

detaileddescription.para: If the state of morphological anti-aliasing is successfully set, ADLX_OK is returned. If the state of morphological anti-aliasing is not successfully set, an error code is returned. Refer to ADLX_RESULT for success codes and error codes.

Morphological anti-aliasing is an edge-smoothing technique with minimal performance overhead. The applications must run exclusively in full-screen mode. Not applicable to DirectX® 12 and Vulkan® applications.
Note: When morphological anti-aliasing is enabled, the anti-aliasing mode must either be AA_MODE_ENHANCE_APP_SETTINGS or AA_MODE_OVERRIDE_APP_SETTINGS, as returned by GetMode.
